workflow: MISSION: 1. Login. 2. Navigate to PIM module and Add a new employee (FirstNameTest LastNameTest). 3. Click SAVE to finish onboarding. 4. Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users. 5. Create a System User for the newly created employee. THE MISSION IS ONLY SUCCESSFUL IF ALL STEPS ARE COMPLETED.

trace.thought: The current page is the login page. The goal is to first login, then navigate to PIM, add an employee, save, navigate to Admin, and create a system user. I need to fill in the username and password fields and click the login button. I will use the standard username and password from test_data.

I am on the login page and need to fill in the password field to complete the login process. The first step of the goal is to log in, and I have already filled the username. Now I need to fill the password and click the login button.

The goal is to login to OrangeHRM. I have filled the username and password fields. Now I need to click the login button to proceed. According to the knowledge bank, the proven locator for the login button is `page.get_by_role("button", name="Login")`.

The goal is to complete a multi-step workflow: Login, PIM -> Add Employee, Save, Admin -> User Management -> Users, Create System User. I have successfully logged in. The next step is to navigate to the PIM module and add a new employee. I will click the 'PIM' link to navigate to the PIM module.

I am currently on the OrangeHRM Dashboard page, and I have successfully logged in. The next step in the goal is to navigate to the PIM module. I will click on the 'PIM' link to navigate to the PIM module.
I am currently on the Employee List page, which is part of the PIM module. The goal is to add a new employee. Therefore, I need to click the 'Add' button to navigate to the 'Add Employee' page.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and need to fill in the employee details as per the goal. The goal specifies 'FirstNameTest LastNameTest' for the first and last names. After filling the names, I will click the 'Save' button to complete this step. This addresses step 2 of the goal.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the 'First Name' field. The next step is to fill in the 'Last Name' field as per the goal. I will use the element with text 'Last Name' to identify the correct input field.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the first name and last name. The next step is to click the 'Save' button to complete the onboarding process for the new employee, as per step 3 of the goal.

The goal is to complete the onboarding process by navigating to the Admin module and creating a System User for the newly created employee. The previous step was saving the employee details. Now, I need to navigate to the Admin module to proceed with creating a system user. I will click on the 'Admin' link to navigate to the Admin module.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. The previous step successfully navigated to the Admin module. Now, I need to navigate to User Management -> Users and then click the 'Add' button to create a new system user. The current page is 'OrangeHRM - System Users', which is the correct page. So, I need to click the 'Add' button to create a new system user.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. I am currently on the Admin / User Management page, which is step 4 of the overall goal. The next step is to click the 'Add' button to create a new user.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. I am currently on the 'Add User' page, which is the correct page to proceed with this step. I need to click the 'Save' button to finalize the user creation.
